title: Food Heist
description: Take 4 food from the group's stockpiles and place it in your personal stash. Discard 2 additional food from the group's stockpiles.

title: Water Heist
description: Take 4 water from the group's stockpiles and place it in your personal stash. Discard 2 additional water from the group's stockpiles.

title: Watch the Stockpile
description: You were getting suspicious, so you decided to spend the night watching the stockpiles. Players must reveal their last played secret actions.

title: Propaganda
description: Pull some strings from the shadows. Give +8 Leadership to a player. To indicate the player, stamp the card with the decal matching the target player's color.
